column4: When I go into Hardware Drives, the nVidia drivers are marked as enabled, but show "Not In Use". Why would this happen?
Hardware drivers even
did u restart after u installed them?

the restricted manager
but now I'm making progress. before nvidia-xconfig was yellow about missing a device driver line. Now, it ran alright with no grumbling.
